title: Hritika Kathuria
text:
hritika.kathuria@polytechnique.edu
linkedin.com/in/hritika-kathuria


I’m a PhD student at Ecole Polytechnique and INRIA with Ioana Manolescu and Maxime Buron in the CEDAR team at LiX.





From October 2024

Topic: Decentralized semantic data sharing with access control Main areas: secure data sharing in a decentralized, OBDA (ontology based data access)-style setting; RDF Integration systems; Semantic Web; data integration in heterogenous sources. Open source code in Java.




From March 2024 to September 2024, Nokia Bell Labs Paris

Enhanced an established methodology in Topological Data Analysis (TDA) for analyzing scientific field evolution on a dataset of patents, improving its ability to capture nuanced trends.
Developed advanced NLP-driven algorithms with dimensionality reduction for eﬃcient innovation landscape analysis.




From February 2023 to August 2023, École Normale Supérieure

Developed a computer vision pipeline that fine-tuned classification models to detect facial landmarks with 87% accuracy, providing statistical tests and presented the work at the EHBIA in London.







2024, École polytechnique - Attended ISWS 2025 and VLDB Summer Schools



2022 - 2024, Learning Planet Institute

Exchange at ENS Paris and ESME Paris




2019 - 2022, University of Delhi

Exchange at University College London and University of Oslo






Programming Languages: Java, Python, SQL, C++
Visualization Tools: Tableau, PowerBI
Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, PyTorch





English: Fluent
French: Intermediate
